Entry.JapaneseText: ……そう言えば、 やけに口数が少なかったな。
Entry.EnglishText: Come to think of it, they seemed pretty tight lipped.
Entry.Notes: Wasn't there something off about those three we just passes?

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたと違って、 落ち着いてるだけでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: Unlike you. Are you sure they weren't just being tranquil?
